name: Abnormal
description:
Don't just run and Shoot!

In Abnormal, the goal isn’t to just kill anything you see in front of you; but to look and recognize if an enemy is attacking you or it’s just a friend trying to hug you!

If you shoot your GREEN friends, your score is reduced. And yes, your score can actually get to negative numbers!

The floor is lava

You are fighting in a tiled floor map which changes its identity every moment. If you walk on RED floors you lose your hard earned score!

On the other hand, the GREEN floors always welcome you with a good score boost.

Well, That's very Abnormal!

As you might find out at first, this retro style shooter has a very colorful and classic interface which is based on Cute Adblocker. You can find Backrooms enemies and Dasher's bosses voices and even the great and powerful Masher itself in 3D! That's a fun mixture to enjoy! And of course, it's Abnormal.
